meta.title: Passo by Beyond | Palm Jumeirah Dubai
meta.description: Invest in Passo by Beyond at Palm Jumeirah. Ultra-luxury beachfront residences with 250m private beach. Two iconic towers, 625 residences. 60/40 payment plan. Handover Q3 2029. Get a free consultation from Dubai market experts!

propertyHero.shareText: Check out Passo by Beyond on Palm Jumeirah.
propertyHero.title: Passo
propertyHero.subtitle: Discover modern living with premium design, smart layouts, and flexible payment plans.

description: Passo by Beyond is an ultra-luxury beachfront development on the crescent of Palm Jumeirah, featuring two sculptural towers â€” Avita and Bella â€” home to a limited collection of 625 residences. With 250 metres of private white-sand beach, panoramic views of the Arabian Gulf, and architecture inspired by the coastal environment, Passo redefines waterfront living on one of the last remaining beachfront plots on Palm Jumeirah.

The project offers 1 to 4-bedroom apartments, 4 to 5-bedroom penthouses with double-height layouts and plunge pools, and exclusive 6-bedroom beach mansions with multi-level indoor-outdoor living. Each residence features floor-to-ceiling windows, open-plan layouts, high-end finishes, and smart home systems â€” all designed to maximize natural light and ocean views.

advice.testimonial: Our specialists will consult you on any issues and help you conclude a swift transaction with the lowest risk in order to protect your investment.

beach.title: 250m Private White-Sand Beach
beach.description: Residents enjoy direct access to a pristine 250-metre private beach with breathtaking views of the Arabian Gulf, creating a seamless indoor-outdoor lifestyle of unparalleled coastal luxury.

community.title: Resort-Level Wellness & Leisure
community.description: From a 260 sqm wellness pavilion with spa facilities and a sky-level infinity pool to a Montessori-inspired kids' pavilion and an executive library, Passo delivers five-star resort amenities for every resident.

tags.skyPool: Sky-level infinity pool and landscaped gardens
tags.cascadingPools: Cascading pools across podium and beach levels

developer.titleSuffix: is an ultra-luxury real estate developer in Dubai
developer.description: Beyond is an emerging ultra-luxury developer in Dubai with close affiliations to Omniyat â€” one of the region's most respected names in high-end real estate. While operating independently, Beyond shares a design-forward ethos and commitment to delivering landmark residential buildings in ultra-premium locations. Guided by a philosophy of architectural excellence and nature-inspired design, Beyond creates residences that harmonize with their surroundings while setting new benchmarks for luxury living in the UAE.

location.title: Location
location.description: Palm Jumeirah is Dubai's most iconic waterfront address, offering residents an unrivalled blend of exclusivity and connectivity. Passo is situated on the crescent of Palm Jumeirah â€” one of the last remaining beachfront plots on the island â€” providing panoramic sea views toward Burj Al Arab and Atlantis. With direct access to Sheikh Zayed Road and proximity to Dubai Marina, JBR, and Downtown Dubai, residents enjoy world-class dining, retail, and entertainment within minutes.

questions.question: What makes Passo by Beyond a unique investment on Palm Jumeirah?
questions.answer: Passo is located on one of the last remaining beachfront plots on Palm Jumeirah's crescent, making it a rare opportunity in an established ultra-premium market. The project features 250 metres of private beach, two architecturally distinctive towers by Beyond (affiliated with Omniyat), and a limited collection of just 625 residences. With projected rental yields of approximately 6.9% and eligibility for the UAE 10-year Golden Visa, Passo combines lifestyle appeal with strong investment fundamentals.

questions.question: What is the payment plan for Passo by Beyond?
questions.answer: Passo offers a 60/40 payment plan: 10% at booking, 10% one month after booking, then 5% installments every six months through the construction period, with the remaining 40% due at handover in Q3 2029. This structure allows buyers to spread payments over the construction timeline while keeping the majority of the investment tied to the completed asset.

questions.question: What types of residences are available and what are the starting prices?
questions.answer: The project offers 1-bedroom apartments from 968 sq. ft. starting at AED 5.5M, 2-bedroom apartments from 1,587 sq. ft. starting at AED 8.5M, 3-bedroom apartments from 2,122 sq. ft. starting at AED 15M, and 4-bedroom apartments from 3,419 sq. ft. starting at AED 24M. Premium options include 5-bedroom penthouses from 7,569 sq. ft. with double-height layouts and plunge pools, as well as exclusive 6-bedroom beach mansions from 10,167 sq. ft. with multi-level indoor-outdoor living.

questions.question: How convenient is the location of Passo for daily living and connectivity?
questions.answer: Passo enjoys a prime position on the Palm Jumeirah crescent with direct access to Sheikh Zayed Road. Atlantis The Royal and The Pointe are just 4 minutes away, Nakheel Mall is 12 minutes, Dubai Marina and JBR are 13 minutes, and Downtown Dubai with Burj Khalifa is approximately 12â€“15 minutes by car. Dubai International Airport is reachable within 35 minutes. International schools, hospitals, and world-class dining are all within close proximity.

termsAndConditions.termsIntro: By using this website, you agree to the following terms and conditions. If you do not agree, please discontinue use.
termsAndConditions.section1Text: This website is owned and operated by an authorized channel partner, a licensed real estate brokerage based in Dubai, UAE. We are an authorized channel partner for the real estate projects promoted on this website. We are not the official developer, unless explicitly stated.
termsAndConditions.section2Text: This website is intended to provide general information about real estate projects. All information is subject to change without notice. You may not copy, distribute, or reproduce any content without written permission.
termsAndConditions.section3Text: While we strive to provide accurate and updated information, we do not guarantee the completeness or accuracy of the content. Prices, layouts, offers, and availability are subject to change by the developer or seller without prior notice.
termsAndConditions.section4Text: We are not liable for any direct or indirect losses resulting from your use of the site or reliance on its content. Final purchase decisions should be made after professional and legal consultation.
termsAndConditions.section5Text: This website may include links to third-party websites for your convenience. We do not endorse or take responsibility for the content, policies, or practices of these external sites.
termsAndConditions.section6Text: We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms & Conditions at any time. Continued use of the website after changes indicates your acceptance of the revised terms.
termsAndConditions.section7Text: These Terms & Conditions are governed by the laws of the Emirate of Dubai and the United Arab Emirates.

privacyPolicy.section1Text: This Privacy Policy explains how https://passoresidences.ae/ ("we," "our," or "us") collects, uses, and protects the personal information you provide through our website. By using our website, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
privacyPolicy.section2Intro: When you submit your details on our website, we may collect the following information:
privacyPolicy.section3Intro: We use your personal information to:
section3List: Contact you regarding real estate projects and offers
Provide information about properties and services
Improve our services and website experience
privacyPolicy.cookiesNote: We may use cookies to enhance user experience and track website performance. You can disable cookies in your browser settings if you prefer.
privacyPolicy.section4Intro: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share your data with:
section4List: Authorized developers or project owners, if required
CRM or marketing platforms used to follow up with leads
privacyPolicy.section5Text: Our website may contain links to developer or third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external websites.
section6List: Request access to your personal information
Request correction or deletion of your data
Withdraw your consent to receive marketing communications at any time by contacting us
privacyPolicy.section7Text: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. Any updates will be posted on this page.
privacyPolicy.section8Text: For any questions regarding this Privacy Policy or to exercise your data rights, please contact:
